text: Luis Fernando Miranda Molinares (born 27 August 1997) is a Colombian footballer who plays as a right winger for Categoría Primera A side Deportes Tolima. ==Club career== ===Cúcuta Deportivo=== Getting his debut in the Categoría Primera B for Expreso Rojo in the 2015 season where he made 9 appearances during the year, Miranda joined Cúcuta Deportivo ahead of the 2017 season. He got his debut for the club on 5 March 2017 against Atlético FC, where he was in the line up, before getting replaced in the 64th minute.CÚCUTA DEPORTIVO VS. ATLÉTICO 1 - 1, soccerway.com, 5 March 2017 Miranda got his breakthrough in the 2018 season and became an important player for Cúcuta Deportivo. ===Deportes Tolima=== On 24 December 2019, Deportes Tolima confirmed the signing of Miranda.Luis Miranda, de ‘motilón’ a ‘pijao’: fue confirmado como nuevo jugador del Tolima, gol.caracoltv.com, 23 December 2019 ==International career== His performances for Cúcuta Deportivo in the 2019 season earned him a call-up from the Colombia Olympic football team in November 2019.Luis Fernando Miranda, nuevamente convocado a la Seleccion Colombia sub 23, laguajirahoy.com, 7 November 2019 He got his debut on 17 November 2019 when he came of the bench to play the last 22 minutes against Japan U23.Maicaero suma minutos con la Selección Colombia Sub 23, laguajirahoy.com, 19 November 2019 ==References== ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:Association football wingers Category:Colombian footballers Category:Colombia youth international footballers Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Categoría Primera B players Category:Tigres F.C. footballers Category:Cúcuta Deportivo footballers Category:Deportes Tolima footballers
title: Luis Miranda (footballer)
